attributes.action: employ people on job seekers allowance in local council postings, so the tax we pay actually pays for wages instead of being wasted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: money is being wasted on this allowance every week and it is about time it was stopped. if the seekers refuse to do the jobs, they should get no benefits whatsoever. i would feel much happier paying my tax if i knew it was actually being earned by someone.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
